definition: to drill/to bore/to get into/to make one's way into/to enter (a hole)/to thread one's way through/to study intensively/to dig into/to curry favor for personal gain
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Drilling and blasting are important components in mine construction design.
sentences.chinese: 鑽眼爆破工作是礦山施工設計的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: It emphases introduces the way and the effect of drilling and blasting construction at the bedrock section of main shaft.
sentences.chinese: 重點介紹了井筒基岩段鑽眼爆破施工方法及效果。
